item.title: Nordic BLE development with SES and VS code in Ubuntu
item.description: The nRF5 series of Bluetooth low energy chip is a very popular platform from Nordic Semiconductor. Currently there are four IDEs with compiler supported by Nordic, however, for Linux users there are only two options available: SEGGER Embedded Studio (SES) and GNU/GCC.
